"The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."

@field: scoring_rubric
| Points | Criteria |
|--------|----------|
| 5 | Clear pronunciation, natural rhythm and intonation |
| 3 | Understandable with minor errors |
| 0 | Incomprehensible or missing |
